casebody.data:
George L. Lepofsky, Trustee v. Kenneth J. Slapin et al. (6348)

Dupont, C. J., Stoughton and Nokcott, Js.

Argued March 8 decision released April 5, 1989 Blair Axel, pro hac vice, with whom was Michael D. Bromley, for the appellants (defendants). Lawrence M. Lapiñe, with whom, on the brief, was Christopher R. Bello, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
